sentences.sentence: It turned out to be his last dalliance with the education system.
sentences.translation: 这一次竟成了他对教育体制最后的嘲弄。

sentences.sentence: Easy and pleasant as their life at Paris was, it was after all only an idle dalliance and amiable trifling.
sentences.translation: 尽管他们在巴黎过着简单又惬意的生活，但那毕竟只是闲散的闲混和和蔼可亲的琐事。

sentences.sentence: No, Mr Terry's real offence was, I am sure, to try to prevent his alleged dalliance being reported by the tabloids.
sentences.translation: 我可以肯定地说，特里真正错误在于试图阻止媒体小报们报道他的这遭出轨。
